channel.title: Crash in blastpit
channel.description: When i turn on that big giant fan, game just crashes. not instantly, but when it starts spininig fast.

item.title: Crash in blastpit
item.dc:creator: Dr_Tub
item.description:
There were various solutions posted in the bug reporting section.

Kill the guard-zombie in the little room opposite the entrance door. Destroy all the crates in the area before you turn it on. Don’t look at the fan after you turn it on.

I didn’t experience these myself but hopefully one will help you.

Read full topic
